text: fancy tickets to the fight in las vegas that took five years to confirm ? think again . tickets for the $ 250million -lrb- # 160m -rrb- bout between floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao at the mgm grand on may 2 are already being flogged for as much as $ 26,500 -lrb- # 17,200 -rrb- on ticketnetwork.com . mayweather officially announced the mega-fight with pacquiao by sharing a photograph of the contract on his social media account on friday , confirming the fight all punters want to see . floyd mayweather has confirmed he will face manny pacquiao at the mgm grand in las vegas on may 2 . mayweather shared the official signed contract for the fight via his shots social media account on friday . mayweather and pacquaio will fight at the mgm grand in las vegas on may 2 . click here to read the full story . yet those hoping to witness the blockbuster will have to spend big . while ringside seats are being priced at # 17,200 , the same website 's cheapest ticket was # 5,060 -lrb- # 3,300 -rrb- . while those flogging the tickets will get a handsome payday , it will hardly compare to that of mayweather and pacquaio . mayweather is understood to have commanded a 60-40 split of the purse , meaning he will rake in a minimum $ 150m -lrb- # 96m -rrb- and pacquaio at least $ 100m -lrb- # 64m -rrb- . the 37-year-old is believed to have been the dominant figure throughout negotiations -- right up to getting his wish to announce the fight via shots.com - a social media site he has a stake in . he posted the contract along with the caption : ` what the world has been waiting for has arrived . mayweather vs. pacquiao on may 2 , 2015 , is a done deal . i promised the fans we would get this done , and we did . we will make history on may 2nd . do n't miss it ! this is the signed contract from both fighters . ' meanwhile , the pay-per-view price has not been set but could reach $ 100 -lrb- # 65 -rrb- , according to the la times . mayweather last fought when he beat marcos maidana in the pair 's rematch last september in las vegas . mayweather twice beat argentinian fighter maidana in 2014 - winning both bouts on points . pacquiao was last in action when he dominated chris algieri over 12 rounds in macau last november . pacquiao , from the philippines , looked in imperious form as he comfortably beat algieri in china .
summary: floyd mayweather 's $ 250m showdown with manny pacquiao is on .   the mega-fight will take place at the mgm grand in las vegas on may 2 .   mayweather posted an image of the signed contract on friday night .   mayweather : i 'm giving fans # 160m pacquiao fight they want .   mayweather : pacquiao 's last opponent was n't even a proper boxer .   click here for all the latest boxing news .
